name: own-tempo
effect: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
flavor_text.platinum: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
